check-configuration.name: Custom of Sun Checks (Eclipse)
check-configuration.description: Slightly modified version of Sun Checks that better matches the default code formatter setting of Eclipse.

check-configuration.name: Custom of Google Checks
check-configuration.description: Checkstyle configurartion that checks the Google coding conventions (https://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn-history/r130/trunk/javaguide.html).
